buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/25 hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300 shadow-md hover:shadow-secondary/25 hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent/10 text-foreground hover:text-accent rounded-full px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors duration-200

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 p-6
cards.interactive: cursor-pointer hover:border-primary/50 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-1

inputs.base: flex h-12 w-full rounded-lg border border-input bg-background px-4 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 transition-all duration-200

navigation.header: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-border/40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

marketing.hero: min-h-[80vh] flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden

dashboard.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-border bg-card hidden md:flex flex-col
dashboard.grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6

hero.alt: Modern school building with glass facade and green campus

students_learning.alt: Diverse group of students studying in library

science_lab.alt: Students conducting experiments in science lab

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'DM Sans' for body text. Import them from Google Fonts in index.css.
Implement a 'Light Mode' first approach with vibrant primary colors (Indigo/Violet) and sunny accents (Yellow).
For the Marketing pages, use large typography, generous whitespace (p-12+), and bento-grid layouts for galleries.
For the Dashboard, use a clean sidebar layout with 'cardless' or minimal card designs for widgets. Avoid heavy shadows.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Do not use placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (scale up, color shift) and focus rings for accessibility.
Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and scroll animations (fade-in, slide-up).
Strictly follow the 'Anti-AI Designer' persona: Avoid generic templates, use asymmetry, and prioritize emotional connection.
Use Shadcn UI components for complex interactions (Dialog, Dropdown, Form) but customize their styling to match the vibrant theme.
Ensure the codebase uses .js/.jsx extensions as requested, not .ts/.tsx.
Add 'data-testid' attributes to all interactive elements for testing.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic: generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays and sticky headers.
Do NOT apply universal transitions (e.g., 'transition: all'). Animate specific properties.
Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Use modern button styles (pill-shaped, sharp) with interaction animations.
Never use AI assistant emojis for icons. Use Lucide React icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are encouraged for marketing pages.
